Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.mobilesync.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BriefcaseObjectInfo
    Capture fields that we want to sync down for a given object type (and record type) in a briefcase
    ChildrenInfo
    Simple object to capture details of children in parent-child relationship
    Constants
    This class contains commonly used constants, such as field names, SObject types, attribute names, etc.
    MobileSyncLogger
    A simple logger util class for the MobileSync library.
    ParentInfo
    Simple object to capture details of parent in parent-child relationship
    SOQLBuilder
    Helper class to build a SOQL statement.
    SOQLMutator
    To manipulate a SOQL query given by a String Better than doing regexp maybe it's time to start using a proper parser (e.g.
    SOQLMutator.SOQLTokenizer
    Simple SOQL tokenizer Tokens returned are either: - SOQL keyworkds (select, from, where, having, group by, order by, limit, offset) - top level parenthesized expression - top level single quoted expression - strings without white spaces - white spaces
    SOSLBuilder
    Helper class to build a SOSL statement.
    SOSLReturningBuilder
    Helper class to build a SOSL returning statement.
    SyncOptions
    Options for sync up / down
    SyncState
    State of a sync-down or sync-up
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Constants.Mode
    Enum for available data fetch modes.
    SyncState.MergeMode
    Enum for merge modes
    SyncState.Status
    Enum for sync status
    SyncState.Type
    Enum for sync type
